revised_title: Experimental Transmission of Goitre from Man to Animals: The Role of Fecal Infection and Earthworms
tldr: This study investigates the transmission of goitre from humans to animals through fecal infection of the water supply. The researchers found that drinking water contaminated with the feces of goitrous individuals caused 50% of the female goats to develop enlarged thyroid glands. Earthworms were found not to be involved in the spread of goitre.
